name: Lin Aung
title: Senior Full Stack Developer
bio: Senior Fullstack Developer with expertise in Laravel, React, and Node.js. Experienced in building CRM systems, e-commerce platforms, and scalable web applications serving thousands of daily users.

experience.description: Built and maintained 3 projects with React, Vite, TypeScript and Node.js. Added over 200 Storybook components and achieved 85%+ test coverage.
Developed core modules for greenfield CRM system with 5000+ daily users. Boosted application performance by 50% through database query optimization.
Managed and maintained 4-5 critical web applications. Built dynamic, responsive interfaces with Laravel and React.
Migrated Java API to PHP, integrated global payment methods, and engineered admin panel for e-commerce platform.

projects.name: Aptive Environmental CRM
projects.description: CRM system handling 5000+ daily users with comprehensive test suite and optimized performance.

projects.name: Carzuno
projects.description: Revamped UI and added quality of life features to drive more sales.

projects.name: Servd
projects.description: AWS-powered CRM with granular permissions. Migrated to Livewire for dynamic UI.

projects.name: WERLOOP
projects.description: E-commerce web application with multi-vendor system and multiple payment integrations.
